name: Ray The Robot
description:
Ray The Robot is a VR 3rd person platformer game!

Explore as Ray and platform through the environment. Use your motion controllers to assist Ray through various challenges and puzzles! 

This game was developed for the Epic Games MegaJam 2017. I'm very proud of this game and I hope you enjoy it!

Requirements:
Oculus Rift
2 Touch Controllers
[This does work on HTC Vive! My friend tried it out. I developed it with an Oculus Rift so I hope it works for other Vive owners] 

Developed by Matthew Palaje
Music is by Raymond Cripps
